name: Ghost Library
description:
Ghost Library is a game set in a haunted library where you avoid ghost and other obstacles and try to collect all the keys in the level.

I mainly made this to test out my new level editor but the game turned out quite nice in my opinion. However, the game is quite hard and could be considered a rage game.

controls:  

  left/right = A/D or left arrow/right arrow

jump = space or W or up arrow

reset = r

credits   

art and programming by me, OneEgg (AKA Oliver)

music created by Skrjablin on OpenGameArt.org (https://opengameart.org/content/slow-melancholic-theme-c64-style)
